synopsis: In episode #11 titled 'SOLOOOO', Devam takes the audience on a personal journey through his experiences with a knee injury, exploring themes of resilience, self-reflection, and the importance of emotional connection. He shares insightful thoughts on relationships, personal growth, and the complexities of navigating life, all while infusing humor and vulnerability into his storytelling.
quotes: The way you live your life every day is how you end up living your life.
You have to give yourself small acts of happiness.
Open your arms if you want to be held.
Cooking isn't that hard; ingredients are just Legos.
You learn that you have to live life because it's worth living.
There's a community of the spirit. Join it and feel the delight.
The ability to love and be loved does exist; you just may not be able to feel it for a bit.
Loneliness and melancholy are beautiful feelings; sometimes they just point to a need of yours that isn't being met.
You can't take responsibility for someone else's happiness.
It's okay to love without expectation; thatâ€™s where the beauty lies.
